cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.20)
add_library(glad STATIC glad.c)
install(TARGETS glad LIBRARY DESTINATION lib INCLUDES DESTINATION include)
if (MSVC)
    if ("${CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE}" STREQUAL "Release")
        target_compile_options(glad PUBLIC /O2)
    else()
        target_compile_options(glad PUBLIC /Od)
    endif()
endif()
target_include_directories(glad SYSTEM PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../include")
